message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $180, which reflects the true value of this item.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $100 for it.
Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your budget constraints, but $180 is my asking price.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $140?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $140 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to meet you at $110.
